Package com.btp.serverData.repos

Class UserRepo

java.lang.Object
com.btp.serverData.repos.UserRepo
public class UserRepo
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the repository where we modify the users on the platform, and saves and loads from the database

    • deleteRecipe

      public static void deleteRecipe​(int id)
      This method deletes the reference for a recipe that has been deleted from all users
      Parameters:
      id - int ID of the recipe

    • updateTree

      public static void updateTree()
      This method saves changes that are active and saves it in the dataBase (json)

    • getUser

      public static User getUser​(java.lang.String email)
      This method is used to retrieve a user from the user tree
      Parameters:
      email - string email for the user that wants to be retrieved
      Returns:
      user obj

    • checkByID

      public static boolean checkByID​(java.lang.String email)
      This method is used to determine if an email already exists in the userRepo
      Parameters:
      email - string email for the user that wants to be verified
      Returns:
      boolean value, true if the user exists, false if it doesnt

    • searchUsers

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> searchUsers​(java.lang.String data)
      This method is used to search users that mat the parameter
      Parameters:
      data - the data that will be used to search
      Returns:
      the results of the search

    • loadTree

      public static void loadTree() throws java.io.IOException
      This method loads the tree from the json file that was stored
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception

    • notifyAll

      public static void notifyAll​(java.lang.String notification)
      this method is used to message all users in the platform
      Parameters:
      notification - String message to send to all users

    • addChefRequest

      public static void addChefRequest​(java.lang.String id)
      This method is used to add a chef request, to the pending chef request json
      Parameters:
      id - String email, the id of the person making the request

    • recommend

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recommend​(java.lang.String data)
      this method is used to retrieve recommendations to the user
      Parameters:
      data - String data to be used in the recommendations
      Returns:
      recommendations

    • removeChefRequest

      public static void removeChefRequest​(java.lang.String id)
      This method is used to remove a chef request from the active chef requests data base
      Parameters:
      id - string id of the request that is going to be removed

    • isActiveRequest

      public static boolean isActiveRequest​(java.lang.String id)
      this method is used to check if there is an existing chef request
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user making the request
      Returns:
      boolean value, depending of whether or not the email is an active request

    • getChefRequests

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getChefRequests()
      This method is used to return all active chef requests
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings, corresponding to the email of all active requests
